title: My Microsoft Edge does not open so I cannot get Internet Explorer. When I try to open it, I get this message; "This app can't open"
body:
My Microsoft does not ope. I get this message: This app ca't open. Microsoft Edge can't be opened using the built-in Administrator account. Sign in with a different account and try again"
Where do I go to do the signing in? Nothing seems to work. Do I have to get rid of this Microsoft Edge?
